text: KRVH is a non-commercial educational, Classic rock and Sports Radio formatted FM broadcasting radio station licensed to the River Delta Unified School District in Rio Vista, California, serving the Sacramento River Delta region of Northern California. ==References== ==External links== * * KRVH Tuned In To The Community * RVH Category:High school radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1973 Category:1973 establishments in California
title: KRVH
